categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Vis'l was a young Jedi Knight. In 40 ABY, after Vis'l returned from the a final training mission with a Jedi Master, the Jedi was at the Ossus Academy when the Galactic Alliance Guard (GAG) attempted to "secure" it, holding the students hostage. Vis'l was on guard duty when GAG Major Salle Serpa moved against the Jedi, and was killed by snipers.
